# nextFocusedItem

**Instance Property**

The item to be focused after the update.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var nextFocusedItem: (any UIFocusItem)? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is set to `nil` if no item is receiving the focus.

## Getting related focus items

- **previouslyFocusedItem**: The item that was focused before the update.
